definition: damaged inanimate objects or their value, the act of damaging something or someone, to give trouble or pain to
details:
adjective
- damaged inanimate objects or their value
= synonyms: weakened
- suffering from physical injury especially that suffered in battle
= synonyms: wounded
noun
- the act of damaging something or someone
= synonyms: damage
- a damage or loss
= synonyms: detriment
- feelings of mental or physical pain
= synonyms: suffering
- psychological suffering
= synonyms: distress
- any physical damage to the body caused by violence or accident or fracture etc.
= synonyms: harm
verb
- to give trouble or pain to
= example: to give trouble or pain to
- to feel pain or be in pain
= synonyms: suffer
- to cause damage or affect negatively
= example: to cause damage or affect negatively
= synonyms: injure
- to cause emotional anguish or make miserable
= synonyms: pain, anguish
- to hurt the feelings of
= example: to hurt the feelings of
= synonyms: wound, spite, bruise, injure, offend
- feel physical pain
= example: feel physical pain
= synonyms: ache, suffer
- be the source of pain
= synonyms: smart
